ABOUT US

AOWSAY creates amazing games that make an emotional impact on gamers around the world!

Information Technology may seem like a few simple lines of code, but for these very lines to deliver results, you need skilled specialists who go beyond just coding. This is where we step in, providing a complete range of innovative IT Services that are easy to implement and fit every budget. We believe that our most important asset is delivering solutions that are tailor-made to take your business to the next level.


THE TEAM


KEITTISAK PHASOMSAP

Developer

Thomas Brush has been making games since he was a teenager. After completing the development of his 5-year passion project Pinstripe, it was released on Steam in 2017 and Nintendo Switch in 2018. Pinstripe received glowing praise from Steam, The Washington Post, and TIME Magazine.
